caption.p: Histopathological study using H&E method and Masson trichrome method for animal groupsâ€™ I-VIII. In Group I with H&E showed severe damage to skin layers and area of complete loss of epidermis (L). Also shows remarkable necrosis (N) and degeneration (D) as well as occlusion (O) of capillaries that irrigate hair follicles. Special stain (MT) shows severe loss of collagen fibres in the dermis area (yellow arrow) magnification is 200X.
